chamber.hospital: Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra

doctor.name: Dr. A.K.M. Rezwanul Islam
doctor.specialty: Cardiology, Medicine, Rheumatic Fever & Hypertension Specialist
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M. Rezwanul Islam is a Cardiologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Cardiology). He is a Junior Consultant, Cardiology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. A.K.M. Rezwanul Islam at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.hospital: Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Younus Ali
doctor.specialty: Cardiology, Blood Pressure, Rheumatic Fever & Diabetes Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Younus Ali is a Cardiologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, CCD (BIRDEM), D-CARD (BSMMU). He is a Assistant Professor, Cardiology at TMSS Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Younus Ali at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
